sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Animals/Mounts/and Related Gear/Animals/Mounts/and Related Gear/Gecko/Riding/Type
sections.name: Type

sections.body: Larger than even giant geckos, these mammoth lizards have been specifically bred to be used as mounts. Prized for their ability to run along cave ceilings and sheer walls, they require exotic saddles to ride. A riding gecko has the same statistics as a giant gecko with the giant template.
